Action.author: zhaochy
Action.body: ~harrisob@us.ibm.com log4js@2.5.3 have 196 dependencies and a total size of 4.2Mb, while winston@2.4.1 have 6 dependencies and a total size of 167.6kb. Let's change log4js to winston to make a better performance for chaincode instantiate

Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: ~zhaochy Thanks for fixing this. Is this planned to be ported to the 1.1 release stream ?
